Docs.summary: A table of data representing a database result set, which is usually generated by executing a statement that queries the database.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.param: the number of the row to which the cursor should move. A value of zero indicates that the cursor will be positioned before the first row; a positive number indicates the row number counting from the beginning of the result set; a negative number indicates the row number counting from the end of the result set
Docs.summary: Moves the cursor to the given row number in this ResultSet object.
Docs.returns: true if the cursor is moved to a position in this ResultSet object; false if the cursor is before the first row or after the last row
